https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/f82yYeL2Cif5ipMSRjejfQHhyKD.jpg A triptych of short stereoscopic films by Peter Greenaway, Jean-Luc Godard and Edgar Pêra. Includes "The Three Disasters" by Godard, "Cinesapiens" by Pêra and "Just in Time" by Greenaway. 3x3D
